website_summaries.verdict: A simple, colorful, beautiful birdbath with a stained-glass look. Highly affordable; it won't make a huge dent in your pocketbook.
pros: Its glass construction is nonporous and easy to clean
Strong support chain is easy to hang
cons: The glass may not fare well in icy conditions
Because it's a hanging model with no pedestal, you must have a place to hang it

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first day I hung it
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this bird bath is so beautiful. It really is. However the first day I hung it, one of the soldered rings that hangs the chain snapped off so I couldn't hang it anymore. After inspecting the other two rings, it doesnt appear they're soldered well either so I doubt it would've lasted one summer anyway. I didn't have it long enough to notice if the birds actually used it.
customer_reviews.author: AliRyan

customer_reviews.title: First it was a "yes", then it was an "oh no"
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty at first, but it DOES NOT hold up to typical outdoor wear. It's covered in some kind of clear, thin plastic-y coating that started peeling off soon after I hung it from my fig tree. It wasn't in direct sunlight and I kept it filled with water. But regardless, this odd top coat peeled off and now it looks dull and worn. I was really hoping this would've worked out, but I guess you get what you pay for. 😕
customer_reviews.author: Ashni

customer_reviews.title: I really loved the design and this product has so many good ...
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the design and this product has so many good reviews I ordered it without reservations. Well, so that you know, this is not a colored glass, it's a clear glass vessel which has been painted. In other words, after a few uses the color starts to peel off. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Teal

customer_reviews.title: Price Exceeds Quality
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, I didn't want leaded glass for an outdoor bird bath and this would never pass for stained glass. it's painted, and not painted very well. Chips in the paint and/or missed areas with the paint around the edges. I won't bother returning it because it will be covered with bird poop soon enough. Seems sturdy enough; but for the quality, it's not worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: C. K. Shell

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use birdbath
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty birdbath. It is heavy enough with the water to not blow in the breeze. Very stable. And birds have come to it. Because it is glass and smooth, I fill it pretty full so that they can drink from the flat edge. Others have said they use it as a bird feeder; but this would be lovely on a patio or in the garden with little floating candles after dark! Very happy! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Just Thinking

customer_reviews.title: Crooked bowl.
customer_reviews.text: I intend to reach out to the company tonight. The bowl is beautiful and I was hesitant to buy with only 1 review. However, my bowl is crooked and I can't figure out why.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and deep!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! I have a little solar fountain in it and also have a small branch I laid across it for the types of birds that have a hard time with the slick glass. The branch isn't in my picture.
customer_reviews.author: Judy W.

customer_reviews.title: the purple was so pretty and bright
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend bought this item due to the color, the purple was so pretty and bright. Within one week of being outside in the sun, the color completely faded. Now it's almost clear/very pale pink. The color faded and not too happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2, 1 down
customer_reviews.text: In 3 weeks plenty of birds at feeders but no takers in my 2 birdbaths. So, I put a few small stones and a light weight solar fountain. Less than 1 hour later, my birdbath was broken, just 1 day after the 30 day return window. It was pretty, gave me joy, and anticipation. Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: kinghaig

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bathtub for the birds ;)
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful bird bath. It's very pleasing to look at outside our window hanging from the tree that also holds a hummingbird feeder. I like this because it is off the ground and keeps the birds safe from our cat. It's easy to clean and refill.
customer_reviews.author: Klynn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, beautiful bird bath. Hangs perfectly from a shepherds hook, so we can move it anywhere in the yard. We enjoy watching the bluebirds bathe and drink from it. I'm hoping the chains to hang it don't rust. Bought it for a solar disk fountain, but it's not deep enough to sustain the fountain for long (water sent up doesn't always return to the basin), and birds like it better without the fountain.
customer_reviews.author: KD McDonald

customer_reviews.title: It's BEAUTIFUL, but CROOKED :-/
customer_reviews.text: I like it (it's beautiful), but, like others have found, mine is a bit crooked (I've checked for kinks in the chain, and the obvious things). The chains were even twisted when it first arrived (connected in the wrong places), so, I had to undo them to connect them correctly. That was no big deal, but, it seems to indicate that a little more "quality control" may be in order.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren H Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, antique,  stained glass bird bath !
customer_reviews.text: A lovely bird bath that I have hanging on the front of the house beside my bird feeder. I have not seen birds using it yet, but it takes time for them to trust new things. I did find an adorable tree frog enjoying it this morning. Love my little frogs too, as they eat the bugs. I feel sure the birds have been drinking, I just haven't seen it yet. Bird bath is high quality with a stained glass appeal. Only advice I would give to shoppers is to get one that color coordinates with your house color, if you plan to place it on a hanging bracket off your house like I did. It still looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie, children's author and teacher😊

customer_reviews.title: I wonder if it's the reflective glass or whether birds can't easily land on it
customer_reviews.text: I'm still (after nearly a month) awaiting its use by birds. I have numerous birdbaths and all others are an attraction. I wonder if it's the reflective glass or whether birds can't easily land on it? It's in a spot where I exchanged another birdbath (used a great deal by birds) so I know it isn't the garden location with dappled lighting.
customer_reviews.author: L. C. Scheller

customer_reviews.title: Birds don't use it
customer_reviews.text: I think it is lovely, but the birds don't use it, not even the little ones. It's glass, so I know it could get hot and I put it in the shade. They still don't care for it, even when it has been dry. So I can only give it 2 stars. If it is not sturdy or attractive enough for them to use, well, 1 star, and since I'm just cleaning it without them using it, 1 star. They use other bird baths and feeders in my backyard, so ......3 stars for pretty. But just not useful for what I purchased it for. Hopefully, others have had a more positive experience.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie D

customer_reviews.title: Too small to use with the Arteck.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the two together. Evergreen is a stylish piece of glass. I hung it in my aviary. Arteck works but - a Chinese plastic toy. The bird bath is too small. I had to refill every couple of hours. Going with a birdbath that holds at least a gallon. Also I have 7 parrots. One, Diego, is a terror - he tries to destroy everything. I doubt the pump or the Evergreen will last a week in the aviary. Replacing it with a concrete standing bird bath. If the size works for you - buy it. Saludos.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Worthlessness
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little birdbath or feeder. After the first day plastic began to peel away from the surface. Then the color began to disappear. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Parsley

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful addition to my garden
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful addition to my garden, I love it and the birds do too.
customer_reviews.author: Susan austin

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty but it's really small
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty but it's really small. Like a dinner place with a dip small bowl in the middle. The coloring is beautiful. Perfect Size for hanging the bird bath on a shepherd hook.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it is very easy to clean and does not build up mold as my old one did. Because it's made of glass there are no nooks and crannies for mold to get stuck in. It is on the small side but it works fine for my birds. I see many birds using it every day. I put a few rocks in the bottom to give them something to stand on while bathing since the glass may be slippery. I also prefer hanging birdbaths so this one really fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bird bath!
customer_reviews.text: I used this bird bath to hang from our deck rail and see if we could attract some of the smaller birds in our area. Once I cleaned it with warm soapy water, I added a solar powered water fountain, small to medium sized rocks for the birds to stand on and filled it with water. Within a couple of days, we've spotted Orioles, Titmouse, Black Capped Chicadees and Cardinals using it. We're so excited! Love this piece....not too big, it's pretty and it brings us much enjoyment!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Currently I feed over 20 Morning Doves and a over a 50 smaller birds. The bird bath sees very little use. It is too deep. I added smaller rocks to make it shallower. I wanted to see if made a difference and it did. I'll occasionally have a Morning Dove in the water, but the little birds like to hang on the wires holding it to get a drink. It's beautiful, bit scratches easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dcressall

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite birdbaths for small birds
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these lovely hanging birdbaths to put near the wren houses, since wrens need shallower water than my other birdbaths. I looked at every other option, and these are exactly what I wanted. I keep flat stones in the center for the bees and wasps that need perching places when they come for a drink. Very easy to keep clean. Ten stars!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Hanging Birdbath
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this birdbath. I will be making it into a fountain birdbath and can't wait for Spring to see how many birds it attracts. The color is just beautiful and the quality is very, very good.
customer_reviews.author: Nita Sissell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, super pretty, and love the colors!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Super pretty and perfect for where I wanted it! I put my solar fountain in it which fits perfectly so now my hummingbirds will be happy
customer_reviews.author: NLMstylist

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: Very Well Packed and a lovely, quality item at a reasonable price point. The glass is beautiful! I added a bee preserver and placed it near to where our bee hive will be located (just in the process of setting up). It would be pretty to have more than one in the various colors available. I may have to order another one for the front garden. :) (Photo enclosed of my daughter testing the bee smoker. All items (birdbath, bee suit, smoker, bee brush, honey super. berry pink paint from Amazon!)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lynn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but it doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: I loved this birdbath when I bought it, and it looked great outside. The color started to fade quickly, though, which tells me the glass was only painted. Makes me wonder about the effect on the peeling/melting paint on the birds. Also, if you buy it, bring it in when the temps go below freezing. I'd only had it about a year and a half when the bottom broke out – my guess is from freezing? If it's prone to this, some advice in the instruction manual or guarantee would be good.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Chain is of cheap quality - broke first week
customer_reviews.text: The glass piece is beautiful, but the chain to hold it is cheap. I live in Iowa, within one week, the chain broke, and the glass dish shattered when it hit the ground. Super bummed. I wouldn't recommend this item due to the cheap chain, as the piece will fall and break.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Jo

customer_reviews.title: Don't remove the product label!!!
customer_reviews.text: Birdbath looked great until I removed the product information label. When I removed it, it pulled the painted surface off the birdbath and left it with an area of clear glass in the middle of the bath....NOT attractive. I am trying to return in or replace it
customer_reviews.author: Duane Murray

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but birds want nothing to do with it
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for two months. Although beautiful, have not seen one bird drink or take a bath in it. Also, it is flaking. There also is now a return window on the product so beware. Recommend purchasing a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is prettier than I imagined!
customer_reviews.text: I just love my new bird bath! It's gorgeous, sturdy and arrived in one piece. It was packaged well, not too much but just right. It is much prettier than I thought it would be. While hanging I tip it to pour the water out, then wipe clean with a paper towel. I will take it down periodically and clean it with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: pretty birdfeeder
customer_reviews.text: I received this well packaged and ready to hang. It was smaller than I thought in diameter due to the way the product dimensions were written. It is really about 11". But it was so pretty I would not return it. Hung it immediately and the birds love it. A squirrel managed to jump onto it, but I'm fine with that.
customer_reviews.author: kgs

customer_reviews.title: This is painted clear glass.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived promptly, and was well packed. It is really pretty hanging and when the sun shines through it. But. It arrived with a barcode sticker on the bottom. And when the sticker was removed it took the paint with it. This is apparently a clear glass dish with paint applied on the outside. So now I have an irregular clear patch on the bottom of the dish. Ultimately this doesn't affect the use and is not very visible where I have it hanging, but it was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jen H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This dish came packaged very securely, to the point that it was a little difficult to unpack. It looks even better in person than it does in pictures! I decided to order a second one and now use one for water and one for bird seed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: but it is beautiful and great quality
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have said, the birds aren't immediately enticed to bathe in this bath, but it is beautiful and great quality. I had no issues with the chains and was able to use it right out of the box. It took a day or so for the birds to perch on the edge and it may be the slickness of the glass or the depth of the bowl that causes the birds not to actually get in it. But I have seen some birds sit on the edge and drink from it. Iwould buy again just for the quality and aesthetics.
customer_reviews.author: David & Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes it s alfip of the coin when purchasing things because you get them and they’re not as well made but this is a beautiful piece of art
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the box I knew I had made a solid purchase. Sometimes it s alfip of the coin when purchasing things because you get them and they’re not as well made but this is a beautiful piece of art. It looks lovely in the sun and I idmm hung it out in my back yard and can’t wait til the birds come. I decided to use mine as a bird bath since I purchased a different bird feeder. I highly recommend . Looks classy and not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Heavensvoice

customer_reviews.title: The bird bathiest
customer_reviews.text: I think it looks pretty great! It’s already a hit with the bird crew in my back yard. It is deep so I fashioned a twig triangle so the can get in the bath easier. Other than that I’m terribly pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Hanging Birdbath-Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived super fast and in one piece. It is so bright and vivid. Adds a nice pop of color. So far the chains are working fine. The bowl is a pretty good size too! I’ve had it for about a week and no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: JessBroaddus15

customer_reviews.title: Add some color to your porch
customer_reviews.text: I have mine hanging on my porch. It's nice to have, easy to clean. My only complaint is I have to keep filling it because it's used so much. I'd make sure you hang it somewhere it won't fall or get broke.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore

customer_reviews.title: Awesome birdbath
customer_reviews.text: This birdbath is so beautiful!! I purchased another brand earlier this season and there is NO comparison. For the price difference I should have purchased 2 of this one. Quality and appearance are awesome.👍👍
customer_reviews.author: momo

customer_reviews.title: ... it to have a practical bird bath that was easy to maintain
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to have a practical bird bath that was easy to maintain, but it is also absolutely beautiful. I am pleased with the purchase and already received many positive comments about the quality and beauty of the bird bath. Great addition to the yard.
customer_reviews.author: mill worker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful- it too good for outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: Truly beautiful & delicate looking - after reading the comments about keeping it for indoors, I went ahead with it to hang in an indoor walkway within sight of a Tiffany lampshade. It looks great, with a subtle translucency when light is behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Jocey

customer_reviews.title: Colorful
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but as others have stated, it is not straight. I've gently straightened out each chain link but still have one side that is off by about 1/4 inch. That might not seem like a big deal, but when it hangs from my Maple tree it just looks a bit 'off'. It is pretty as far as the colors go so I am keeping it. Best feature...the finches love it because it is shallow enough for them.
customer_reviews.author: B.V.

customer_reviews.title: Birds love the colors & apparently the squirrels do too!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, vibrant colors. Easy to fill, clean & hang. I believe that the paint comes off when washed, however, I'm not sure if it was scratched already & that chipped the paint... I will pay closer attention next time I wash it & update my post item exactly as described & on time.
customer_reviews.author: KimAnne

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Evergreen Garden bird bath bowl that I've purchased. This hanging bowl is smaller than normal bird bath bowls and measures approximately 11.25 x11.25 and holds up to about 3 cups of water. It's perfect for hanging on my patio. I bought the green and blue bowl. It's beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Hanging Bird Bath
customer_reviews.text: This is item is beautiful, sturdy and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Katie's reviews

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product, misleading information
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that the quality of this product is not the one advertised. In the picture, you can see how by just taking away the label at the base, its paint came out.
customer_reviews.author: S. Valencia

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS, ALTHOUGH THE BIRDS IGNORE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this five stars because it is just so beautiful. Like others, however, I have yet to see a single bird use it! I think it is just too slippery. They have nothing to grip. I like the idea of possibly putting pebbles in the bottom. Still, it is a beautiful decoration and looks as good or better than the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Anomaly 70

customer_reviews.title: the colors are fantastic and for the money the quality can't be beat
customer_reviews.text: the colors are fantastic and for the money the quality can't be beat. I haven't hung it yet, but hope to get it up in the next day or two. I am sure our birds will love to get them clean in this pretty tub.
customer_reviews.author: Nita Mckelvey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty...but a little on the small side
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, I wanted a cheaper bird bath because most are in the $30-$40 price range. This bird bath is fine for the price, around $20. It's a little small, but it's pretty. I took the hanger off and placed this in my garden directly on the ground. It's easy to clean and I'm sure the birds will enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Marquis

customer_reviews.title: A Work of Art
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beautiful hanging bird bath ever! It looks just gorgeous in my garden, like tiffany stained glass! So happy with it and it was shipped in a very sturdy container so no worries about breakage! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Vianne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bird Bath
customer_reviews.text: I love this Bird Bath, as it is both functional and beautiful. It comes with the hanging chain so it can hang it from a small tree limb, or a larger one with add't hardware. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: L. DeMaio

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown
customer_reviews.text: Received this item today and will probably keep it, since it would be a hassle to return. It is definitely not as pictured above - the hanger is a simple metal chain and hook, and there is no decorative finial on the bottom. Paint on the inside is vibrant, but sloppy and inconsistent. I wasn’t expecting true Tiffany leaded glass for the price, but would have like to get something near what was represented in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Great little bird feeder
customer_reviews.text: Great little bird feeder...only issue is paint chips or wears aftr many months of water in it, or it may be the changes in temperature. The birds love to drink from it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin the Engineer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: My Tiffany-Inspired birdbath is gorgeous and in my tree. It is so easy to clean. I don't even have to remove it from the tree to clean. Just dump out old water, partially fill with clean water and rub gently with my hand, dump out and refill. I have seen many birds using it so far. This is one of my favorite "bird" items I have. It will make a beautiful gift for any bird lover or as in my case, a gorgeous purchase for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Squirrels sit in it to enjoy their treats
customer_reviews.text: It's a very pretty hanging feeder bowl, especially when the sun is rising in my forest. The colors are rich and warm, seems sturdy enough, and the squirrels are comfy sitting on the rim or sitting right in the bowl while having their treats. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Hemingway

customer_reviews.title: Not stained glass and
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I thought the item was going to be stained glass. I was disappointed when it wasn't. It doesn't even look like it is so I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: bentley's jojo

customer_reviews.title: ... we are in a drought the little birdies would like some water
customer_reviews.text: I figured since we are in a drought the little birdies would like some water, they found it within 2hrs of me putting it out. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: keZiah

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful piece. Unfortunately, after only a few weeks, one of the three chains broke off where it was welded to the cap. I do not think it can be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: It's so beautiful..........
customer_reviews.text: I have it on a Shepard's hook outside my window. It's been out in the full sun and the colors did not fade. I have since moved it to the back in the am sun............shade since I got MY MOST AWESOME WATER FOUNTAIN! Seriously? I would love to receive this as a present. It's really gorgeous ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Birdbath
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful birdbath, tiffany inspired, and I love looking at it. It is slippery but the birds do drink from it. It took them awhile to use it but now seem to enjoy it. I recommend terra cotta birdbaths because the birds can actually comfortably bathe and splash around in the birdbath instead of sitting on the edge or hanging from the chain to drink. It is a good source of water for San Diego birds.
customer_reviews.author: Marty O

customer_reviews.title: It would be very pretty if it wasn't broken
customer_reviews.text: It would be very pretty if it wasn't broken. One of the holes where the chain attaches is cracked and the chain is different lengths. I have the chain from on old hanging bird bath that I will try to use and will try to do some kind of repair on the cracked hole so hopefully it will not break all the way through. I don't think this will last long.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great construction.
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors of the bird bath I have not put it up yet we have had bad weather and I know that as soon I will had my sherpards hook put up. I also bought a solar powered fountain pump. I can’t wait for my son to put it up. The Handing Glass Bird Bath is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta S Jennings

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, but I probably would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: One chain appears to be about one or two links shorter than the other two so it doesn't hang perfectly level. All of the chains appear almost rusty. The bowl itself is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda L. Goleman

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty bird bath. It is small. Great for the little birds. it is made of glass though so I'm going to assume that in 90 degree weather it probably heats up a bit too much. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look cheap
customer_reviews.text: Completely impressed with the look and feel. We added this to a bird feeding station. Very classy looking.
customer_reviews.author: Btchsbck

customer_reviews.title: Looks gorgeous in my tree!
customer_reviews.text: This item was pretty much just as expected. I’m giving it 5 stars though it did have one small flaw... the product sticker on the bowl itself peeled off about an inch worth of the paint. It’s not the sellers fault, and I expect that that after some wear and tear this would’ve happened anyway. Otherwise, it was easy to take out of the box, hang in the tree, and put water into.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE SHATTERS EASILY
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE. Unlike a similar one I owned before, this one has a metal finial at the bottom of the bowl. A pretty touch, but we had a *brief* cold snap last week and a circle of glass at the bottom of the bowl broke and fell out. This didnt happen with my other one, so I suspect the metal finial gets colder than the glass and shatters it.
customer_reviews.author: LCD in Lexington

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: Not good for birds. Plastic peels and the colors fade when you wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Z

customer_reviews.title: Not a keeper!  Too messy
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy it again. Birds make such a mess. The edge is too wide and they can stand on it too far in and make such a mess that the water stays contaminated. Very pretty but not practical.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Adams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful birdbath!
customer_reviews.text: This hanging glass birdbath is just as pictured and is lovely. I gave it only 4 stars because it hangs unevenly. But I don't think this will matter to the birds!
customer_reviews.author: Pippy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for a reason. Salvageable.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty from far away. Bubbles. Color is inconsistent and black chain is tacky brass plastic of some sort. Might be able to paint it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I got as a gift for my sister's birthday. Haven't hung out yet, but I can say that it is quite beautiful. The picture doesn't do it justice. Appears to be sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Joan M Stanfield

customer_reviews.title: Delicate.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom. It only lasted one summer. It’s more delicate than you would think. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: LMLCABC06

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, birds are using.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our bird garden. Birds took a few weeks to adjust but they use it.
customer_reviews.author: NEfanman

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and colorful glass birdbath. Well packed, quickly ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and colorful glass birdbath. Well packed, quickly shipped. Birdbaths must be cleaned regularly, and this one will be easy--just tilt to dump the water, wipe, and refill. I'm excited to hang it when all danger of frost is over, and plan to bring it in during winter.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Chain rusted and glass colors faded
customer_reviews.text: Within one summer, the chain rusted, then broke and the glass colors faded considerably.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and just the right size!
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful! The colors of the glass are bright and gorgeous! The chain looks sturdy too. I hung mine in a shepherds hook in my yard. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Moani'ala

customer_reviews.title: NOTHING like the photo.
customer_reviews.text: I received a huge cheaply painted piece of trash that looks NOTHING like the photo. NOTHING like it. So disappointed. I ordered TIFFANY. Not glass painted by first graders.
customer_reviews.author: JPF

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a bronze, red and yellow color as the picture depicted. (We were replacing one that broke). We received a brightly colored purple and blue one, that appears more cheaply made. Not pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: catmfbreck

customer_reviews.title: Peeled
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty at first. I probably thought it was stained glass and that the colors would shine through but that’s definitely not the case. Start d peeling soon after use. Now what ever film coated the inside of the bowl is completely gone and it lacks color
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Third One
customer_reviews.text: Received my order today. Arrived timely, well packaged & no breakage. This is the 3rd time buying this birdbath - 2 last year & this one. The company has even improved the quality from last year & the color is deeper & very pretty. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: P Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Bird Bath
customer_reviews.text: Product is actually quite pretty and arrived in tact and as advertised. No issues with ordering and delivery. Although, no birds have visited yet I am satisfied. That's just a matter of time. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Cannibella Lestrange - Derby Witch

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price to flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Looked good worked well till a squirrel jumped on it and it shattered not very durable
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty with my solar pump spitting up water. Just wish it was larger.
customer_reviews.author: Rose A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to our patio!
customer_reviews.text: It a beautiful bowl! One of the hooks wouldn't straighten out to hang it. So my husband careful worked it around carefully with needle nose pliers. Hopefully the paint doesn't come off like other reviews said. The paint is on the bottom of the bowl. I don't see that as a problem.
customer_reviews.author: efjade

customer_reviews.title: Super pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Mother's Day, so her and her 2 yr old can watch birds together. It was so much prettier in person, I had kind of thought about keeping it!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lu

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gotten any visitors in the bath yet, but looks very pretty either way!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Davis

customer_reviews.title: Bird Bath
customer_reviews.text: The colors on this bird bath are stunning. The birds haven't it used it as of yet with water in it but if I throw bird seed in it, they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: The glass birdbath is beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: The glass birdbath is beautiful and well made. I hung it on a shepherd hook and put bird seed in it, but I have a deer that eats the bird seed at night. Will have to hang it n a taller pole, but love this dish!
customer_reviews.author: henry cooper

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Easy to hang and birds love it!
customer_reviews.author: lil789

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: As an artist,I needed a gift for a good friend who is an Audobon member.This is beautiful,and well construced.Have my Amazon sent to work.The whole art department loved it
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: pretty bird bath
customer_reviews.text: This is so pretty and comes in four different colors. Haven't seen any birds bathing yet but it's only been a couple days. It will be easy to store in the winter and looks nice hanging outside my patio window
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Broke right out of box so never had a chance to use 😖
customer_reviews.author: TABASATOWN

customer_reviews.title: Marginal
customer_reviews.text: Great style and color Problem is it is not deep enough. H2O evaporates quickly in dead of summer requiring filling every day
customer_reviews.author: lefty

customer_reviews.title: Pretty . . . but . . .
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors! But as it said in some of the other reviews, it does hang crooked no matter what adjustments you make.
customer_reviews.author: occandy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and a bird favorite
customer_reviews.text: I just love this. And more importantly, so do the birds! They drink out of it every day. Just remember not to let it freeze! I did that on the first one and lost it.
customer_reviews.author: m2marsh

customer_reviews.title: everything needed to hang-beautiful
customer_reviews.text: will buy more its everything I expected well packaged other than annoying styrofoam bits all over but im very happy
customer_reviews.author: Popi Kevmo

customer_reviews.title: Product looks great. Quality seems good. The downside is the birds do not go near this.
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great. Quality seems good. The downside is the birds do not go near this. At first I thought it was because it was to deep but that is not the case. I have put rocks in the bottom so the birds would have some "footing" but it does not matter. If I could still send it back I would.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: It looks lovely in our border.
customer_reviews.text: It's lovely and we are hoping that our hummingbirds will use it for hydration and/or bath.
customer_reviews.author: Holly P

product_meta.title: Evergreen Colorful Hanging Glass Birdbath (Tiffany)
feature_bullets: FEATHERED FRIENDS WILL FLOCK: Lure colorful, friendly birds to your garden with these beautiful, artisan glass hanging bowls

ARTISTICALLY DESIGNED: You'll love this colorful, crafted glass design inspired by the beauty of nature, It will catch the light and add beauty to your garden or yard. Measures approximately 11.25 x 11.25 x 23 inches
EASY TO INSTALL: Included chain hangs approximately 20 inches. Simply hang and enjoy!
DUO DESIGN: Holds up to 3 cups of seed or water - use it as a bird bath or feeder! Simply rinse the dish to clean and fill with a snack for birds or a cool spot for them to take a break.
BIRD LOVER? Click our Brand Name to explore more birding options! We've got everything you need in a variety of well crafted, durable and beautiful designs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars760 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
